settings.helpText: To build up a nested url structure, assign this article to a parent page. This helps to build up the site URL structure. e.g. Titanic hits iceberg! may have a parent Page of News. Resulting in the URL; /news/titanic-hits-iceberg.html. If left empty, it will assume that Home is the parent page.
Relate content to this article. This may be other articles or pages
Specify the Tags that you would like to associate with this content.
Configure the Meta data for a page, such as descriptions and social tags
This field makes up the URL that this content will sit on
